description:
Astro Bears Party is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master game about running around a planet and avoiding each otherâ€™s Magical Beary Ribbons. Jump and hover over Ribbons using a jetpack. Perform dashes to threaten your opponents. Be the last Bear standing!

Choose one of 4 Bears with different playstyles and battle between 2-4 players. Take a challenge in single player mode and beat your own record in Jetfish Hunting!    

Key Features:
- 4 cute Astro Bears with different playstyles
- Local multiplayer for 2-4 players
- Jetfish Hunting single player mode
- Beautiful high quality 3D graphics
- HD Rumble support
name: Astro Bears Party
